alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Clay, north central Webster, Adams, southwestern Hamilton, southeastern Buffalo and Hall Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1225 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm gust front along a line extending from near Shelton to near Kenesaw to near Blue Hill. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Juniata, Ayr and Prosser around 1235 AM CDT. Hastings and Wood River around 1245 AM CDT. Glenvil and Hansen around 1250 AM CDT. Doniphan, Cairo, Alda and Trumbull around 1255 AM CDT. Fairfield and Inland around 100 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 287 and 320. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Webster
